title: Jorgoral's Greatsword
content:
Jorgoral's Greatsword Rare 3~13 Damage 2d6 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Strong castle-forged steel surmounts a grip of sturdy leather - this immense sword is capable of disembowelling giants in a single swipe. Greatsword Two-Handed 2.7 380
